verses.text: \w Ὀψὲ|strong="G3796"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w σαββάτων|strong="G4521"\w*, \w τῇ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἐπιφωσκούσῃ|strong="G2020"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w μίαν|strong="G1520"\w* \w σαββάτων|strong="G4521"\w*, \w ἦλθεν|strong="G2064"\w* \w Μαρία|strong="G3137"\w*\f + \fr 28:1 \ft μαρια \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,B,D,W [99.5%] RP,HF,OC,CP,TR ¦ μαριαμ ℵC [0.5%] NU\f* \w ἡ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Μαγδαληνὴ|strong="G3094"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἡ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἄλλη|strong="G0243"\w* \w Μαρία|strong="G3137"\w* \w θεωρῆσαι|strong="G2334"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w τάφον|strong="G5028"\w*.

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἰδού|strong="G3708"\w*, \w σεισμὸς|strong="G4578"\w* \w ἐγένετο|strong="G1096"\w* \w μέγας|strong="G3173"\w*, \w ἄγγελος|strong="G0032"\w* \w γὰρ|strong="G1063"\w* \w Κυρίου|strong="G2962"\w* \w καταβὰς|strong="G2597"\w* \w ἐξ|strong="G1537"\w* \w οὐρανοῦ|strong="G3772"\w*,\f + \fr 28:2 \ft ουρανου \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,D [98%] RP,HF,OC,CP,TR ¦ 1 και ℵB,C,W [2%] NU\f* \w προσελθὼν|strong="G4334"\w* \w ἀπεκύλισεν|strong="G0617"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w λίθον|strong="G3037"\w* \w ἀπὸ|strong="G0575"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w θύρας|strong="G2374"\w*,\f + \fr 28:2 \ft απο της θυρας \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,C,W [94%] RP,HF,OC,CP,TR ¦ 123 του μνημειου [5%] ¦ — ℵB,D [0.5%] NU\f* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐκάθητο|strong="G2521"\w* \w ἐπάνω|strong="G1883"\w* \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Ἦν|strong="G1510"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w ἡ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἰδέα|strong="G2397"\w*\f + \fr 28:3 \ft ιδεα \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* W [92%] RP,HF,OC,CP,TR ¦ ειδεα A(B)C,D [8%] NU ¦ — (ℵ)\f* \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w* \w ὡς|strong="G5613"\w* \w ἀστραπὴ|strong="G0796"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἔνδυμα|strong="G1742"\w* \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w* \w λευκὸν|strong="G3022"\w* \w ὡσεὶ|strong="G5616"\w*\f + \fr 28:3 \ft ωσει \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,C,W [97%] RP,HF,OC,CP,TR ¦ ως ℵB,D [3%] NU\f* \w χιών|strong="G5510"\w*.

\w Ἀπὸ|strong="G0575"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w φόβου|strong="G5399"\w* \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w* \w ἐσείσθησαν|strong="G4579"\w* \w οἱ|strong="G3588"\w* \w τηροῦντες|strong="G5083"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐγένοντο|strong="G1096"\w*\f + \fr 28:4 \ft εγενοντο \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,W [99.5%] RP,HF,OC,CP,TR ¦ εγενηθησαν ℵB,C,D [0.5%] NU\f* \w ὡσεὶ|strong="G5616"\w*\f + \fr 28:4 \ft ωσει \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* C [98%] RP,HF,OC,CP,TR ¦ ως ℵA,B,D,W [2%] NU\f* \w νεκροί|strong="G3498"\w*. The angel does his duty

\w Ἀποκριθεὶς|strong="G0611"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἄγγελος|strong="G0032"\w* \w εἶπεν|strong="G3004"\w* \w ταῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w γυναιξίν|strong="G1135"\w*· «\w Μὴ|strong="G3361"\w* \w φοβεῖσθε|strong="G5399"\w* \w ὑμεῖς|strong="G4771"\w*· \w οἶδα|strong="G1492"\w* \w γὰρ|strong="G1063"\w* \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* \w Ἰησοῦν|strong="G2424"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἐσταυρωμένον|strong="G4717"\w* \w ζητεῖτε|strong="G2212"\w*.

\w Οὐκ|strong="G3756"\w* \w ἔστιν|strong="G1510"\w* \w ὧδε|strong="G5602"\w*· \w ἠγέρθη|strong="G1453"\w* \w γάρ|strong="G1063"\w*, \w καθὼς|strong="G2531"\w* \w εἶπεν|strong="G3004"\w*. \w Δεῦτε|strong="G1205"\w*, \w ἴδετε|strong="G3708"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w τόπον|strong="G5117"\w* \w ὅπου|strong="G3699"\w* \w ἔκειτο|strong="G2749"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Κύριος|strong="G2962"\w*.\f + \fr 28:6 \ft ο κυριος \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,C,D,W [99.5%] RP,HF,OC,CP,TR ¦ — ℵB [0.5%] NU\f*

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ταχὺ|strong="G5035"\w* \w πορευθεῖσαι|strong="G4198"\w* \w εἴπατε|strong="G3004"\w* \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w μαθηταῖς|strong="G3101"\w* \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w* \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* ‹\w Ἠγέρθη|strong="G1453"\w* \w ἀπὸ|strong="G0575"\w* \w τῶν|strong="G3588"\w* \w νεκρῶν|strong="G3498"\w*· \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἰδού|strong="G3708"\w*, \w προάγει|strong="G4254"\w* \w ὑμᾶς|strong="G4771"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w Γαλιλαίαν|strong="G1056"\w*· \w ἐκεῖ|strong="G1563"\w* \w αὐτὸν|strong="G0846"\w* \w ὄψεσθε|strong="G3708"\w*.› \w Ἰδού|strong="G3708"\w*, \w εἶπον|strong="G3004"\w* \w ὑμῖν|strong="G4771"\w*.»

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐξελθοῦσαι|strong="G1831"\w*\f + \fr 28:8 \ft εξελθουσαι \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,D,W [98%] RP,HF,OC,CP,TR ¦ απελθουσαι ℵB,C [2%] NU\f* \w ταχὺ|strong="G5035"\w* \w ἀπὸ|strong="G0575"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w μνημείου|strong="G3419"\w* \w μετὰ|strong="G3326"\w* \w φόβου|strong="G5399"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w χαρᾶς|strong="G5479"\w* \w μεγάλης|strong="G3173"\w*, \w ἔδραμον|strong="G5143"\w* \w ἀπαγγεῖλαι|strong="G0518"\w* \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w μαθηταῖς|strong="G3101"\w* \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w*. Jesus’ second appearance

\w Ὡς|strong="G5613"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w ἐπορεύοντο|strong="G4198"\w* \w ἀπαγγεῖλαι|strong="G0518"\w* \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w μαθηταῖς|strong="G3101"\w* \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w*,\f + \fr 28:9 \ft ως δε επορευοντο απαγγειλαι τοις μαθηταις αυτου \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,C (88%—with minor variations) RP,HF,OC,CP,TR ¦ — ℵB,D,W (11.8%) NU ¦ two other variants (0.2%) (Here is as crass a case of homoioteleuton as anyone could wish—the last four words are identical!)\f* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἰδού|strong="G3708"\w*,\f + \fr 28:9 \ft ιδου \+it rell\+it* ¦ 1 ο D,W [10%] TR\f* \w Ἰησοῦς|strong="G2424"\w* \w ἀπήντησεν|strong="G0528"\w*\f + \fr 28:9 \ft απηντησεν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,D,W [95%] RP,HF,OC,CP,TR ¦ υπηντησεν ℵB,C [5%] NU\f* \w αὐταῖς|strong="G0846"\w* \w λέγων|strong="G3004"\w*, «\w Χαίρετε|strong="G5463"\w*.» \w Αἱ|strong="G3588"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w προσελθοῦσαι|strong="G4334"\w*, \w ἐκράτησαν|strong="G2902"\w* \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w* \w τοὺς|strong="G3588"\w* \w πόδας|strong="G4228"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w προσεκύνησαν|strong="G4352"\w* \w αὐτῷ|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Τότε|strong="G5119"\w* \w λέγει|strong="G3004"\w* \w αὐταῖς|strong="G0846"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Ἰησοῦς|strong="G2424"\w*· «\w Μὴ|strong="G3361"\w* \w φοβεῖσθε|strong="G5399"\w*· \w ὑπάγετε|strong="G5217"\w* \w ἀπαγγείλατε|strong="G0518"\w* \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἀδελφοῖς|strong="G0080"\w* \w μου|strong="G1473"\w* \w ἵνα|strong="G2443"\w* \w ἀπέλθωσιν|strong="G0565"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w Γαλιλαίαν|strong="G1056"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐκεῖ|strong="G1563"\w*\f + \fr 28:10 \ft και εκει \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* ℵA,C,W [90%] RP,HF,CP ¦ κακει B,D [10%] OC,TR,NU ¦ εκει [0.5%]\f* \w με|strong="G1473"\w* \w ὄψονται|strong="G3708"\w*.» Guards are bribed

\w Πορευομένων|strong="G4198"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w αὐτῶν|strong="G0846"\w*, \w ἰδού|strong="G3708"\w*, \w τινὲς|strong="G5100"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w κουστωδίας|strong="G2892"\w* \w ἐλθόντες|strong="G2064"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w πόλιν|strong="G4172"\w* \w ἀπήγγειλαν|strong="G0518"\w* \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἀρχιερεῦσιν|strong="G0749"\w* \w ἅπαντα|strong="G0537"\w* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w* \w γενόμενα|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w συναχθέντες|strong="G4863"\w* \w μετὰ|strong="G3326"\w* \w τῶν|strong="G3588"\w* \w πρεσβυτέρων|strong="G4245"\w*, \w συμβούλιόν|strong="G4824"\w* \w τε|strong="G5037"\w* \w λαβόντες|strong="G2983"\w*, \w ἀργύρια|strong="G0694"\w* \w ἱκανὰ|strong="G2425"\w* \w ἔδωκαν|strong="G1325"\w* \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w στρατιώταις|strong="G4757"\w* \w λέγοντες|strong="G3004"\w*·

«\w Εἴπατε|strong="G3004"\w* \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* ‹\w Οἱ|strong="G3588"\w* \w μαθηταὶ|strong="G3101"\w* \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w* \w νυκτὸς|strong="G3571"\w* \w ἐλθόντες|strong="G2064"\w* \w ἔκλεψαν|strong="G2813"\w* \w αὐτὸν|strong="G0846"\w* \w ἡμῶν|strong="G1473"\w* \w κοιμωμένων|strong="G2837"\w*.›

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐὰν|strong="G1437"\w* \w ἀκουσθῇ|strong="G0191"\w* \w τοῦτο|strong="G3778"\w* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἡγεμόνος|strong="G2232"\w*, \w ἡμεῖς|strong="G1473"\w* \w πείσομεν|strong="G3982"\w* \w αὐτὸν|strong="G0846"\w*\f + \fr 28:14 \ft αυτον \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,C,D,W [99.5%] RP,HF,OC,CP,TR[NU] ¦ — ℵB [0.5%]\f* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ὑμᾶς|strong="G4771"\w* \w ἀμερίμνους|strong="G0275"\w* \w ποιήσομεν|strong="G4160"\w*.»

\w Οἱ|strong="G3588"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w λαβόντες|strong="G2983"\w* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἀργύρια|strong="G0694"\w* \w ἐποίησαν|strong="G4160"\w* \w ὡς|strong="G5613"\w* \w ἐδιδάχθησαν|strong="G1321"\w*. \w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w διεφημίσθη|strong="G1310"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w λόγος|strong="G3056"\w* \w οὗτος|strong="G3778"\w* \w παρὰ|strong="G3844"\w* \w Ἰουδαίοις|strong="G2453"\w* \w μέχρι|strong="G3360"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w σήμερον|strong="G4594"\w*.\f + \fr 28:15 \ft σημερον \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* ℵA,W [99.5%] RP,HF,OC,CP,TR ¦ 1 ημερας B,D [0.5%] [NU]\f* The Great Commission

\w Οἱ|strong="G3588"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w ἕνδεκα|strong="G1733"\w* \w μαθηταὶ|strong="G3101"\w* \w ἐπορεύθησαν|strong="G4198"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w Γαλιλαίαν|strong="G1056"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ὄρος|strong="G3735"\w* \w οὗ|strong="G3756"\w* \w ἐτάξατο|strong="G5021"\w* \w αὐτοῖς|strong="G0846"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Ἰησοῦς|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἰδόντες|strong="G3708"\w* \w αὐτὸν|strong="G0846"\w* \w προσεκύνησαν|strong="G4352"\w* \w αὐτῷ|strong="G0846"\w*,\f + \fr 28:17 \ft αυτω \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,W [97%] RP,HF,OC,CP,TR ¦ — ℵB,D [0.5%] NU ¦ αυτον [2.5%]\f* \w οἱ|strong="G3588"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w ἐδίστασαν|strong="G1365"\w*.

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w προσελθὼν|strong="G4334"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Ἰησοῦς|strong="G2424"\w* \w ἐλάλησεν|strong="G2980"\w* \w αὐτοῖς|strong="G0846"\w* \w λέγων|strong="G3004"\w*· «\w Ἐδόθη|strong="G1325"\w* \w μοι|strong="G1473"\w* \w πᾶσα|strong="G3956"\w* \w ἐξουσία|strong="G1849"\w* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w οὐρανῷ|strong="G3772"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w*\f + \fr 28:18 \ft επι \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* ℵA,W [99.5%] RP,HF,OC,CP,TR ¦ 1 της B,D [0.5%] [NU]\f* \w γῆς|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w Πορευθέντες|strong="G4198"\w*\f + \fr 28:19 \ft πορευθεντες \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* ℵA [95%] RP,HF,OC,CP ¦ 1 ουν B,W [5%] TR,NU ¦ νυν D\f* \w μαθητεύσατε|strong="G3100"\w* \w πάντα|strong="G3956"\w* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἔθνη|strong="G1484"\w*· \w βαπτίζοντες|strong="G0907"\w* \w αὐτοὺς|strong="G0846"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ὄνομα|strong="G3686"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Πατρός|strong="G3962"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Υἱοῦ|strong="G5207"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Ἁγίου|strong="G0040"\w* \w Πνεύματος|strong="G4151"\w*·

\w διδάσκοντες|strong="G1321"\w* \w αὐτοὺς|strong="G0846"\w* \w τηρεῖν|strong="G5083"\w* \w πάντα|strong="G3956"\w* \w ὅσα|strong="G3745"\w* \w ἐνετειλάμην|strong="G1781"\w* \w ὑμῖν|strong="G4771"\w*· \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἰδού|strong="G3708"\w*, \w ἐγὼ|strong="G1473"\w* \w μεθ|strong="G3326"\w*᾿ \w ὑμῶν|strong="G4771"\w* \w εἰμι|strong="G1510"\w* \w πάσας|strong="G3956"\w* \w τὰς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἡμέρας|strong="G2250"\w*, \w ἕως|strong="G2193"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w συντελείας|strong="G4930"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w αἰῶνος|strong="G0165"\w*.» \w Ἀμήν|strong="G0281"\w*.\f + \fr 28:20 \ft αμην \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [98.5%] RP,HF,OC,CP,TR ¦ — ℵA,B,D,W [1.5%] NU\f*\sup ,\sup*\f + \fr 28:20 \ft In the colophons, \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [50%] have, “published eight years after the ascension of Christ”, to which all but \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* add, “in Jerusalem”. For 50% of the MSS to have this information probably means that the tradition is ancient; and of course, I have demonstrated, to my own satisfaction at least, that \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* goes back at least to the 3\+sup rd\+sup* century. If this information is correct, then Matthew was ‘published’ in 38/39 AD. The same sources have Mark published two years later (40/41) and Luke another five years later (45/46), while John was ‘published’ thirty-two years after the ascension, or 61/62 AD. Not only were the authors eyewitnesses of the events, but many others were still alive when the Gospels appeared. They could attest to the veracity of the accounts, but could also be the source of textual variants, adding tidbits here and there, or ‘correcting’ something that they remembered differently.\f*\sup ,\sup*\f + \fr 28:20 \ft The citation of \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* is based on the following fifty-one MSS—18, 35, 55, 128, 204, 246, 363, 386, 402, 479, 510, 547, 553, 586, 685, 757, 789, 824, 867, 897, 928, 1062, 1072, 1075, 1111, 1117, 1145, 1189, 1339, 1435, 1461, 1496, 1503, 1551, 1560, 1572, 1637, 1652, 1667, 1694, 1713, 2122, 2175, 2253, 2352, 2382, 2466, 2503, 2554, 2765 and I.2110—all of which I collated myself. I also took account of two collated by Scrivener (201, 480), but did not re-collate them. 2554 is a ‘perfect’ representative of \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* in Matthew, as it stands, while the exemplars of 1072, 1117, 1461, 1496, 1713 and I.2110 presumably were as well. Others come very close. The uniformity is impressive. Since these MSS come from all over the Mediterranean world (Sinai, Jerusalem, Patmos, Bucharest, Moscow, Constantinople, Lesbos, Leukosia, Aegean, Meteora, Kalavrita, Tirana, Mt. Athos [ten different monasteries], Athens, Corinth\+sup ?\+sup*, Bologna, Grottaferrata, Vatican, etc.) they are certainly representative of the family, giving us the precise family profile—it is reflected in the Text without exception. I have included six published editions in the apparatus—RP,HF,OC,CP,TR,NU. RP = Robinson-Pierpont (2005), HF = Hodges-Farstad, OC = the Greek Text of the Greek Orthodox Church (also used by other Orthodox Churches), CP = Complutensian Polyglot, TR = \+it Textus Receptus\+it*, NU = N-A\+sup 26\+sup*/UBS\+sup 3\+sup* (N-A\+sup 27\+sup*/UBS\+sup 4\+sup* offer changes in the critical apparatus, \+nd not\+nd* in the text; the text is still that of N-A\+sup 26\+sup*/UBS\+sup 3\+sup*). In the statements of evidence I have included the percentage of manuscript attestation for each variant within either ( ) or [ ]. I have used ( ) for the evidence taken from \+it TuT\+it*, which I take to be reasonably precise. For the variant sets that are not covered there, I mainly depended on Legg (\+it Novum Testamentum Graece Secundum Textum Westcotto-Hortianum.\+it* Evangelium Secundum Matthaeum [Ed. S.C.E. Legg, Oxonii: E. Typographeo Clarendoniano, 1940]). I occasionally supplemented from Swanson, Scrivener and von Soden—the percentages offered, I have used [ ] for these, are extrapolations based on a comparison of these sources. I venture to predict, if complete collations ever become available, that for any non-Byzantine variants listed with 5 to 1% support (in my apparatus) the margin of error should not exceed ±2%; for non-Byzantine variants listed with 10 to 6% support the margin of error should hardly exceed ±4%; where there is some division among the Byzantine witnesses the margin of error should rarely exceed ±15%—since my sources had collated a lower percentage of the extant MSS than \+it ECM\+it* for the General Epistles, for example, my guesses as to percentages are more tentative than they were there, except that I guarantee the witness of \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup*. As an arbitrary decision, I have limited the citation of individual MSS to those dated to the 5\+sup th\+sup* century or earlier. I use \+it rell\+it* to indicate that the reading is supported by all other primary witnesses, and printed editions (of the six included in the apparatus), compared to the other reading.\f*
